Reserve Reservation Policies Parties of 7 - 8 guests MUST book a 7 or 8 Person VIP Package. All VIP Reservations require a non-refundable deposit at the time of booking which is applied towards the total cost of the package. ​ A  Bar Representative will contact you on the day of your scheduled reservation for fulfillment of remaining balance. Arrivals for VIP Reservations begin at 8pm each night with all members of the party arriving by 1030pm, and expire at the time of closing of the bar [NO EXCEPTIONS] ​ Absolutely NO standing on furniture. bottom of page
